articles.title: Prince Philip turns 99: The Queen's husband marks a historic birthday in no-fuss way - USA TODAY
articles.description: Prince Philip, Britain's oldest and longest-serving royal consort, marks his historic 99th birthday with Queen Elizabeth II at Windsor Castle.
articles.content:
Prince Philip was born into royalty nearly 100 years ago. Take a look back on his life in the limelight.
